author: legoDad42
title: MARVELOUS figures - Part 1
review:
Two-Part Review for the 66678 Marvel Studios minifigures blind box, which contains 6 blind bags.
I purchased last year from Amazon 2 boxes. First time EVER between the two boxes I've gotten ALL 12 figures, no duplicates.

PART ONE review (first box): Dr. Spider-Strange, Captain Carter, Captain Falcon, The Vision, Monica Rambeau, and Star Lord-T'Challa.

Pro's...

- ALL exclusive minifigures (including exclusive animal and micro-figures).

- Highly detailed superb graphics on head, torso, body, and legs (all new, original).

- New exclusive accessories, head gear and wig elements.

- Dual molding.

- Jumper plates included with trans-clear bar w/stud for action poses.

- 6 bags, no duplicates (although this is not for every box out there).

Con's...

- Can get a box with duplicates.
(Of note, both boxes I got have the exact same bar code number, and item number.)

Front and side box...

Checklist...

Back of checklist instructions for certain figures...

 

DR. SPIDER-STRANGE (aka: Zombie Hunter Spider-Man, Peter Parker, Spider-Man, Spider-Strange, Peter Strange).

Of note here comes with TWO heads (one which is dual-faced)...

Notice here the nice paint detail in Spidey's eyes, excellent side printing arms/legs, dual-molded legs...

Great looking Spider-Man figure...

 

CAPTAIN CARTER (aka: Peggy Carter, Margaret Carter).

Note new Union Jack shield, dual faced, side-printing arms, legs and dual molded legs...

Comes with 2 trans-light blue 1x1 plates for the Tesseract/Cosmic Cube (the new trans-light blue Minecraft head from Thor's Hammer would've been nice here)...

 

CAPTAIN FALCON (aka: Captain America, The Falcon, Pararescueman)

More exquisite printing and elements here...

EXO-7 Falcon Wings. Printing on both sides...

Printing front, back, side arms and legs. Dual face, dual molded arms and legs too. Highly detailed minifig here...

Notice the printed triangular tile, it's Redwing. The Falcon's trusty surveillance drone (can detach)...

 

THE VISION (aka: White Vision)

Notice nicely detailed graphics all around with some gold paint accents and dual molded legs...

S.W.O.R.D. laptop computer (can open and close). Another exclusive printed element here...

 

MONICA RAMBEAU (aka: Captain Monica Rambeau)

Dual faced, side and back arm printing (although no detail on legs disappointing)...

S.W.O.R.D. Drone helicopter...

Used the extra wrench element from bag to mount the drone...

 

STAR LORD-T'CHALLA (aka: T'Challa Star-Lord, T'Challa).

Comes with great molded Star Lord mask/helmet, dual faced, side leg printing, quad-laser blasters and dual molded legs...

Notice here side leg boot thrusters...

PART TWO's review of the second box will be in another post...
